attributes.action: Increase parking and toilet areas for hgvs Arrange a legal minimum wage.
attributes.additional_details:
Additional Toilets and parking is needed for hgv drivers (long periods without using toilet increases risk of cancer)
Arrange a minimum wage and ban the use of salaries a salary can result in working under minimum wage it costs thousands to get a hgv licence and people don't want to pay it due to not getting it back in return regarding wages. 
Make the industry more Appealing hgv drivers do not get Paid enough for the job they do we spend weeks away from families for rubbish wages.
attributes.background:
Arrange a legal. Minimum wage for all hgv drivers not a national living wage
Increase parking and toilet areas
